TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Tjaljaqavus, title = Tjaljaqavus, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tjaljaqavus} }

S.FORM: laiyi guan imaza i pasakacedas a vecekadan tua akaw king, i viri nakidjekec tua kuljauc, a i kacedas nakidjekec tua taituking a daren kata kinzang, a i keledep nakidjekec tua wanluan kata sinpi, au a i pasakaledep a navalj mavananga a i vangljaw, au i navalj nakidjekec tua kasugagu. izua tu pitju a kuzulj sa sepatj taiday a caucau, a tjuruvuan masanmusalj a kacalisian a guan i akaw tja kedri ta i timur. aza sikataqaljan sedjelj a paiwan zuku. avan nu tjatjuruvuan a paiwan caucau pakata a kinapangaljan a paljavak i taiwan. cinalivatan laiyi guan sedjelj a paiwan zuku a kinaizuanan. tiamadju avan nu pavuwavuwa a qinaljan na se vuculj. ka ripun a djiday, aicu a kadjunangan sipavecik paakawting kata takawzu sa kanrivi. kapuamin a maqaqeci, lemindjelj ta gukusiu i tjaljaqavus, au sipungadan ta "laiyi guan", sipavecik pasa tua takaw king sa kanrivi, ka 1950 a cavilj pavalitan ta akaw king sa kanrivi patjeljatucu. kadjunangan aicu a kadjunangan imaza i pasakaledep a vecekadan gadugaduan, a ljavavavan nua gadu kimaya itua tjelu taiday a maru tadjekuacan, tjaliaw a gadu kata maruqalu tu ljatjaladj aravac. avan nusekuya sana kauvu a kinakadjunangan, a kalevelevan semezan tu kemaledeledev. izua laise pana, waluse pana, djiandawui pana, lili pana kata liaw i livay a tjakakedrian a pana seqaljudj pasa maza, au aza na linbien pana qapulu kemasi kuljauc pasakaledep a navalj a kavulungan, aza i zaya nua waluse pana ljaqedi ta laiyi a tjakudrang macacevung kata laise pana au seqaljudj pasakaledep a navalj, patje ljaqedi ta i calasiv a tjakudrang au ljisasaw ta maruqal, mumalj seqaljudj pasakeledep a navalj. akeledep a navalj. . guciu paljavak tua kadjunangan caucau nasidjaravacan sinupuan kivangvangan racev

laiyi goan imaza i pasakacedas a vecekadan toa akaw king, i viri nakidjekec toa koljaoc, a i kacedas nakidjekec toa taitoking a daren kata kinzang, a i keledep nakidjekec toa wanloan kata sinpi, ao a i pasakaledep a navalj mavananga a i vangljaw, ao i navalj nakidjekec toa kasogago. izoa to pitjo a kozolj sa sepatj taiday a caocao, a tjorovoan masanmosalj a kacalisian a goan i akaw tja kedri ta i timor. aza sikataqaljan sedjelj a paiwan zoko. avan no tjatjorovoan a paiwan caocao pakata a kinapangaljan a paljavak i taiwan. cinalivatan laiyi goan sedjelj a paiwan zoko a kinaizoanan. tiamadjo avan no pavowavowa a qinaljan na se vocolj. ka ripon a djiday, aico a kadjonangan sipavecik paakawting kata takawzo sa kanrivi. kapoamin a maqaqeci, lemindjelj ta gokosio i tjaljaqavos, ao sipongadan ta "laiyi goan", sipavecik pasa toa takaw king sa kanrivi, ka 1950 a cavilj pavalitan ta akaw king sa kanrivi patjeljatoco. kadjonangan aico a kadjonangan imaza i pasakaledep a vecekadan gadogadoan, a ljavavavan noa gado kimaya itoa tjelo taiday a maro tadjekoacan, tjaliaw a gado kata maroqalo to ljatjaladj aravac. avan nosekoya sana kaovo a kinakadjonangan, a kalevelevan semezan to kemaledeledev. izoa laise pana, walose pana, djiandawoi pana, lili pana kata liaw i livay a tjakakedrian a pana seqaljodj pasa maza, ao aza na linbien pana qapolo kemasi koljaoc pasakaledep a navalj a kavolongan, aza i zaya noa walose pana ljaqedi ta laiyi a tjakodrang macacevong kata laise pana ao seqaljodj pasakaledep a navalj, patje ljaqedi ta i calasiv a tjakodrang ao ljisasaw ta maroqal, momalj seqaljodj pasakeledep a navalj. akeledep a navalj. . gocio paljavak toa kadjonangan caocao nasidjaravacan sinopoan kivangvangan racev
